document_data.name: ''Philter of Persuasiveness''
document_data.mainbody: A '''''philter of persuasiveness''''' was a magical substance that boosted charisma.
document_data.Powers: When imbibed, this philter boosted the imbiber's charisma and ability to persuade others. Additionally, the imbiber could make a ''[[suggestion]]'' to all creatures within {{SI|90|ft}} once every ten minutes.
document_data.Notable Owners: [[Shahpesh]], a [[moralist]] from [[Zakhara]], carried a ''philtre of persuasiveness''.{{Cite card/AD&D Trading Cards/1993|375|Shahpesh}}
